Summary: The outside is quite plain. But the rooms were excellent. Must have been recently redone. The beds have no bounce, firm. But very comfortable.  We both slept well; no noise.  The shower control was three times better that what have at home. AC was easy to understand. WiFi good with the password on the TV clicker.   We stay at economy hotels and this was the best balance of cost and amenities. I can’t think of a change I’d suggest. I wish this was closer to our regular spot in Hollywood.
Room tip: Great breakfast one block north across the street. Katie’s?  Really good.

Summary: The whole place has a stench. It's a smoking property. Couldn't wait to get home to shower the stench of that place off of me. Also, they might as well not bother having internet service since it barely crawls. Did I mention the rude staff?  It's unbelievable this place has any stars at all!

They lose my reservation and charge to me an expensive room, it was that or be at 12 am o'clock looking for a diferent hotel   They never clean my room during my stay, the pillows was unconfortable  The attendance wasn't kind

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for.
Summary: Just a place to lay your head down. Don’t expect and nice soft comfy bed, as the mattress was quite hard. They did have different pillows, fluffy, flat you have options. Nothing special here. It’s convenient to places to eat or shop but that’s about it.

Summary Heading: Don't Stay here, extremely rude owner.
Summary: I stayed here recently for work close by. Everything about this place leaves a bad taste in my mouth. Spend your money elsewhere there's way better places and better people to rent from. The owner of the place is an extremely rude and hostile woman.

Good value, but would not stay here more than one night. The bed was extremely uncomfortable (felt like I was sleeping on wood), the floor did not look like it had been cleaned in a while (hair and stains), very little toilet paper was left in the bathroom and no extra roll was available, front door did not fully close and let in light and sound. You can hear your neighbors so depending on who is next to you, it can be distracting. Some positives were the price, the a/c worked, and there was a tv. The shower wasn't too bad, and check-in and check-out was easy. It's OK if you need somewhere to crash for one night and need a shower, but would not recommend for more than one night and if you're planning to rest at the hotel.

this place was a hole,the bathroom had pubic hair all over it ,the sheets were stained and I asked for new sheets and they brought sheets that were even nastier .The people that ran it were nasty and rude,it's like you interrupted their day,never again.

We needed a reasonable, centrally located motel for a one night stay and this Travelodge was very adequate.  Although it was somewhat dated it was affordable, clean, some aspects had been modernized and the location was very desirable. We would consider staying again.

The property itself is okay. It was the making of the reservation and attempting to correct an error that proved to be a total nightmare.  This was supposed to be a simple one-night stay because of guests visiting. When I made the reservation online, somehow the DATE changed on me (I was booking on the Trevelodge site, not a third party). Yes, I should have caught this prior to completing the reservation, but correcting an error should not have been this much of a challenge.  I first noticed the error when I received the confirmation email. I immediately tried to call the property but was unable to reach anyone after multiple tries. Since it was about 8:30 at night I thought maybe no one was available so tried again the next morning.  I tried again to call the next morning and
Manager Response: Hello Sir, I do apologize for any inconvenience faced due to the inability of our new front desk agents to grasp and understand the situation and the subsequent confusion. A deposit is required, as is standard of all new guests. And for this inconvenience please contact me directly in the future and I shall accord you with an appropriate discount on your stay.

Summary: Bed was really hard, blankets had stains and shower head was dirty.  I was stuck staying there because it would have been too expensive to leave and I was around the area for business meetings and other events.
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Miller, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience, but please refrain from asking prospective guest's from staying at our property. Never once did you allow us to rectify any inconvenience. We work extremely hard to give affordable, clean and tidy  accommodations  to our guests.

Summary Heading: Nice queit little motel for a hidden stay!
Summary: I was pleasantly surprised by this little travelodge. It was hidden and really quiet and clean. Not upscale luxury but it fit the bill and was clean and quiet and comfortable. The couple running it were friendly too. I will stay again!
Manager Response: Hello Eric, We thank you for your review and kind words ad are pleased to know you found everything appropriate.

Summary: Travelodge in Brea is a wonderful hotel for the value. Spacious rooms. Clean. Located right in downtown plenty of shopping and nightlife a quick walk away! Friendly helpful staff on hand 24 hours a day for all your needs. It sits in a hotel row of sorts with plenty of competition right next door even yet puts itself above and beyond all others in terms of value and quality
Manager Response: Hello Guest, We thank you for your review and are glad you found everything appropriate. We appreciate your kind words that keep us on our toes to excel in guest satisfaction.

Summary: The owners were really polite and friendly when I came in March for work related meeting. The location is great with plenty of places to eat near by and the room was pretty clean. This place was worth every money I spent and I would definitely recommend this place.
Manager Response: Hello Guest, We truly appreciate your review and rating of our property and assure you and all our guests of excellence in customer satisfaction.

Summary Heading: Stay away from this filthy place
Summary: Room was completely disgusting!!! I Wish I could upload pics to prove how nasty it was... Stains all over the walls spider webs in the corner  Old Blood stains on the sheets  Bathtub was filthy  Won’t ever stay or recommend this nasty place
Manager Response: Hello, Please do not write nasty things about anyone. We have no record of anyone like you ever having stayed with us. This is so false. All our rooms are spotlessly clean and well kept.

Summary Heading: Decent stay, but won’t stay again
Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights while on a quick trip to Disneyland. It was cheaper to take a Lyft back and forth from the hotel to park so the distance was good for us, not very far.   Check in was easy and quick and the front desk staff were friendly enough. We had room 117 on the first floor. The room was for sure dated and in need of some TLC, but appeared to be cleanish. The walls had some serious scuffs mark and are in dire need of being repainted. The carpet is stained very bad, but was clean. We walked barefoot on the carpet and didn’t turn the bottom of our feet black or brown, so could tell it was clean. But for sure needs to be replaced.   The rest of the room was clean and stocked with basics. There is a mini fridge in the room which is a plus and with 3 adults the room was
Manager Response: Hello Sir, Please accept my apologies for inconvenience faced during your stay with us. We are working on changing the mattresses, which are actually Brand new. Also, carpets are being changed to LVT. Please, please give us another opportunity to serve you and I promise you will not be disappointed.

Summary: Room we stayed in needed painting finishing and repairs. Owner is now trying to charge me $65 for damages that my family nor I made...after leaving this hotel. Never will be back. Disappointed due to being a loyal Travelodge user. Won’t be using them anymore.
Manager Response: Zach, There was dent in the wall after you left. It was not so before the room was rented to you. Infact, that was the room we had reserved for Franchise Inspection, so we know that it was in immaculate condition. I know you will deny and you also mentioned in so many words that if we did charge you for damages you would write negative reviews about us. You have succeeded in doing so, while we know this brings down our reputation, we (you and I) know the truth and so does god almighty. God Bless

Summary: I visited in August 2019 from the 16-20 and it was excellent no complaints at all... room was great with some minor flaws but that was ok, we spend the whole day visiting and exploring California, and at the end of the day we had an awesome room to go back and lay our heads.... Breakfast was ok,  no eggs or bacon... but it was good enough to hold us over until lunch! YES! If I visit California again I would stay here.. Might I add the staff was super nice!!! I even witness the owner burning sage around the front desk and walking around with it outside! Nice!!!
Manager Response: Hello Guest,  We thank you for your review and are glad your stay was accommodating  and pleasant. We work hard to create a friendly and courteous environment for our guests and assure you of quality service, always.

Summary: Would only stay here again if I had a strict budget to adhere to.                                         Management made an attempt to rectify problems but there is only so much they could do. Housekeeping and breakfast was a joke.   Location was perfect for what we wanted
Manager Response: Hello Claudia, We made every attempt to make your stay as wonderful as possible. Our breakfast is much more than Brand standards prescribes, which is 2 types of serial, we have boxed cereal that are of 6 different varieties. We have Granola bars which are not even a Brand requirement, and which we know you partook of. Housekeeping and maintenance is of the highest award winning combination. Even after we took care of all your needs by going above and beyond there is nothing but negative reviews on 3 different platforms. Booking.com, Medallia and Tripadvisor. We are absolutely baffled and would not in our wildest dreams have thought you would write such. Throughout your stay and upon checkout you mentioned you found everything appropriate.  You and all other guests are always welcome and we will always provide you with the same level of comfort and service with a smile.

Summary: Not a bad place to stay,they have very good service, the room was very quiet, the bathroom was very clean. I do think that they could use some air freshener for the rooms, other than that I was comfortable there.
Manager Response: Hello Guest, We thank you for your review and are glad you found our accommodations appropriate. We will definitely take your suggestions in a positive light and assure you of the comfort and satisfaction that is expected by all guests.

Summary: Excellent service with a very friendly staff. The room was clean, nice and comfortable. Person at the front desk made my check- in very easy. Overall a very pleasant stay and would definitely come back again.
Manager Response: Hello Daniel, We thank you for your review and are glad you found everything appropriate. It is kind words like yours that keep us on our toes and strive for excellence in guest satisfaction.

Summary: Came for a couple days during spring break with family and this was a relatively affordable option, close to downtown Anaheim. The staff was friendly, quick and tidy service, ample breakfast options. Rooms were clean and comforting. WiFi works well, overall would recommend the location to others.
Manager Response: Hello Guest, We thank  you for your review and we are glad we lived up to your expectations. We will continue providing excellence in guest satisfaction and not let our guard down.

Summary: TRAVELODGE IS LOCATED IN PRETTY NICE, PEACEFUL AND CALM ENVIRONMENT. BREA-MALL IS GOOD NEAR BY PLACE TO DO SHOPPING. Breakfast is ok (cerial, porrage, bananas, eggs, toast, waffles, pastries, coffee and juice). Check in was fast and easy. Room 128 is nice and clean. If you don’t mind to drive bit more then it should be option. I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Guest, We thank you for your review and rating of our property and are glad you found the room and the property to your liking. We look forward to serving you again in the near future and promise you of the same level of comfort and guest service.

Summary: Great ambience, Very good service at the reception. Check-in and check-out services was very easy and quick. Breakfast was great. Had a great stay, really good choice if someone wants to stay. Would recommend this further.
Manager Response: Hello Guest, We thank you for your review and are glad you found everything to your liking. It is positive comments like these that motivates us to work harder in trying to achieve excellence in guest satisfaction.

Summary: If you are here just to sleep, room is very adequate.  Don't be fooled by smell of curry when you check-in.  It only lingered in office area.  Rooms were Clean.  Room was updated somewhat.   Breakfast consists of sweet rolls/muffins and coffee/tea.  Area is acceptable and easy access from interstate.
Manager Response: Hello Guest, We thank you for your review and are glad you found our accommodations adequate. Please be re-assured that there is no working kitchen or food being cooked around or behind the Office area. We have newly updated rooms and we are happy you found them appropriate. Also, Breakfast is as per Brand standards and a little more, which we are constantly trying to improve on. We look forward to serving you in the near future or whenever you are in the area next.

Summary Heading: Clean and Quiet,Pleasent for overnight Stay
Summary: Rooms are clean and quiet. Breakfast is good enough. There were apples,juice,denies, granola bars, breads and coffee in breakfast. Room also had mini microwave and refrigerator ,too. Staff is very cooperative. I had pleasant stay over there.
Manager Response: Hello Eric, We thank you for your review and are pleased to know that you were satisfied with our property, including the room and staff. It is positive words like yours that keep us on our toes and always strive to provide excellence in guest satisfaction.

Summary: The heater blew the air straight up, behind the curatins, causing them to billow out and let light into the room and deflating the air up and behind the curtains instead of into the room.   The breakfast selection was very poor - white bread for toast, margarine, a couple red delicious apples, and 1 small can each of orange juice and apple juice.   I did not bother to eat any of it, and just had a small can of OJ.
Manager Response: We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you during you stay and we assure you that the issue has been resolved. Also, our Breakfast is as per Brand Standards and always replenished as per need. I do want to apologize if you found the breakfast bar inadequate. After talking to the front desk staff and viewing DVR video I wish you had looked a little more, you would have found Danishes, Granola Bars, instant oatmeal besides tea, coffee and boxed cereal. Both types of bread were present too.I do wish you to give us another opportunity to serve you and assure you of excellence in service and room condition.

Summary Heading: Skip if possible, or last resort.
Summary: If you could go somewhere else do it! Rooms are updated, but the table in the corner with the coffee pot I thought was going to fall over. Can hear the traffic on the street. The worse part of the whole room, THE BED!! Feels like your sleeping on the floor or on plywood. No give, just hard hard hard bed. Worse sleep I've had in years.
Manager Response: Hello, We thank you for your review and are glad you found our rooms updated. We do apologize for any inconvenience and would like to reassure you that we will address all your concerns.The mattresses in our rooms are brand new and they are a not really soft. I would like you to give us another opportunity to serve you and I am sure you will find your stay absolutely comfortable. I only wish you had let us know of your issues with the room during your stay, we would definitely have tried to rectify the situation to the best of our ability.

Summary: Clean and comfortable with good mgmt. I will stay here again. Nice shower head with good water pressure and refrigerator and microwave in room. Security cameras throughout parking lot. Pleasant and quiet.
Manager Response: Hello Mr.James, We thank you for your review and are pleased to find that you found our property and rooms to be clean, comfortable, pleasant and quiet. I will pass this on to our staff who are always striving to excel in guest satisfaction.

Summary: We stayed for 1 night and had no complaints at all. Staff was friendly, parking was free, there‘s an ice machine outside and a fridge & microwave in every room, bathroom was clean & bed aswell. Wasn‘t noisy & was a nice stay in general. Would recommend for an overnight stay!
Manager Response: Hello Mr.Pascale, We thank you for your review and are glad you that you found our property to your liking and adequate to your needs. I will pass this review to our staff so they are further encouraged to continue to strive in guest satisfaction and excellence in service. For Travelodge Brea Manager

Summary: The room was very clean and the remodel was beautiful. I love the granite counter tops and the tubs was wonderful. The towels and amenities were top rate.  The bed wasn't the most comfortable but I still slept well.
Manager Response: Hello Martin, We thank you for your review and are glad you found our facilities to be clean and well kept as well as the amenities to be adequate and appropriate. I do wish to apologize if you found the bed a bit hard, (these are brand new beds) and I will talk to our suppliers about this.  I do wish to inform you though, that it is positive reviews like yours that help us keep striving to exceed guest expectations. Thank You, For Travelodge Brea Manager

Summary: My reservation was waiting for me when I arrived in the early evening. I was given a room upstairs that was clean, simple but still with some nice features.  Had the appearance of a recent painting and some lighting fixture updating.  Good front desk host people.  Convenient location for Fullerton and N. Orange County.  Not many frills, but I was given what I paid for.  Would stay again.
Manager Response: Hello Mr.Taylor, We thank you for taking time out to review our Hotel and are pleased to find that you found our accommodations to your liking. It is positive feedback from guests like yourself that keeps us motivated to excel in customer satisfaction and to keep updating the property as per guest needs. We look forward to serving you again in the near future. Thank You, For Travelodge Brea Nick

Summary Heading: They put the bare minimum in the room, front desk didn’t...
Summary: They put the bare minimum in the room, front desk didn’t provide the wifi password, the guy didn’t even know where my room was located
Manager Response: I apologize for inconvenience caused due to front desk errors. Our rooms are equipped with all Brand standard amenities and we would gladly give you more had you asked. Also, the Wi-Fi password is mentioned on your key card envelope  at the time of Check-In. Please give us the opportunity to serve you again when you are in the area again and I promise you not to let you down. For Travelodge Brea. Nick

Summary: Check in was fast and easy. The manager was very friendly. I like the location because it is close to Disneyland and Knott's Beery Farm. They are several shopping areas close by too.
Manager Response: Dear Jhon, Thank you so much for your kind words. I’m so pleased that you found us a clean and pleasant place to stay and that our amenities were to your liking. We take real pride in this hotel and in serving guests like you, and I’m extremely happy that you had such a pleasant stay. We look forward to having you with us again soon. Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: Unfortunately,  that was the only good thing they offered. Tried to get towels at 10 p.m. and I was advised that I could not. Was told on have to get them the next day at 6:30 a.m. The carpets were stained, so I was glad I brought my slippers! The so-called breakfast was inclusive of bagged danishes, bread for toast coffee and a couple different cans of juice. That was it. So if you're taking a family there for breakfast don't waste your time nor money.
Manager Response: Mr.Pacheco, I would first like to apologize for you not receiving extra towels late in the night, but you forgot to mention that you were later given double the amount of prescribed towels. There is one insignificant stain on the side of the carpet (which we are trying our best to remove) . You also forgot to mention the instant oatmeal, fruit , muffins and granola bars that were siting there on the breakfast bar. I remember having greeted you each morning that you were here, never sitting down, just devouring standing and then taking off. I also remember having asked you if you were happy with everything and each time you mentioned in the affirmative. It really saddens me to know that, in-spite of our going out of the way to help our guests (I also gave you the best driving directions to where you wanted to go), we are never really able to satisfy  some guests to the fullest. And I am sure if you did genuinely have any issues we would have taken care of the same here during your stay. Please refrain from advising prospective guests as to why they should stay here or not based on your perspective alone.  God Bless For Travelodge Brea, Nick

Summary: Average stay at the Travelodge Brea; somewhat clean furnishings-semi clean sheets. Horrible WiFi connection. $$
Manager Response: And... you decided to stay with us again. In-fact, as I write this, you are a guest at our Hotel for a second time. Which shows that you chose us over other accommodations available in town. I hope we have addressed your issues and have found your stay pleasant, once again.

Summary: Very friendly staff and nice and quiet stay. Great place for families visiting to stay when you just don’t have room at home. Location is near university, shopping, restaurants, market and freeway. Great value!

Clean and comfortable room with mini-fridge, microwave oven and coffee maker with supplies. It was nice and quiet. Staff was very helpful. Free breakfast and Wifi is a plus. Thanks for the great service!

I visit my family at least once a month and often more than that and I stay at the Travelodge because it represents good value but more importantly because it is scrupulously clean and well maintained.  he owners live on premise and see to everything personally. We  have developed a rapport over the years so that I feel very comfortable here.

The stay was merely OK.  Definately not a 4 out of 5.  Obviously referbish. Clean, but smelled of appoxy or plastic. Not the only guest who noticed or complained. Carpet was stained and dirty. It would do in a pinch, but not bragable. Maybe 6.7 miles from DL, but atleast 30 mins drive.
Manager Response: Hello, We are glad you found our rooms clean and we would like you to know we work very hard to maintain the cleanliness and the 4 star rating , and are always trying to get to a 5. We would really appreciate if guests would tell us during their stay or at Check-Out time if they found something lacking. Because we are always willing to listen and improve. It is unfortunate that when guests are here, and when they are asked, they find everything to their satisfaction. But when they go back home they find faults. We do apologize for any inconvenience and assure you of a satisfactory experience the next time you stay with us.   Nick

Summary: Made reservations for a non smoking room, when we checked in we were told the only room available was a smoking room, it was too late to go somewhere else so we accepted. BIG MISTAKE. Couldn't sleep, uncomfortable bed, pillows, everything smelled like smoke and the shower sprayed everywhere in the bathroom.
Manager Response: Hello Guest, Please look up your Reservation again. You had booked for a Smoking room. And, you checked in long before normal check-in time. It was on a Friday night when we did not have other rooms open. We asked you to cancel the room, since you came here at around 1 pm in the afternoon and you declined, stating you would not mind the smoking room. You stayed in there all day till well past checkout time the next day and when asked, you replied all was good except for the shower. And, we did change the shower head immediately after. I can even send you the original reservation details explaining the type of room you had booked. Please send this to the people who you made the reservation with.  Nick

Summary: Horrible customer service...  Each night I had to get my room key redone just to get in my room, they snickered with my frustration the 2nd night it happened !!!  Room was in poor condition and sparsely filled will towels, hand soap and the carpets were filthy...  They should pay people to stay there and should be ashamed that they make people pay to stay there.  Wyndham should really not have their name associated with this property!!  The only reason I booked with them was due to them being a part of Wyndham properties, never again !
Manager Response: Hello, You booked 2 hotel nights, for 2 different room types. Your key got de-magnetized by you, on the second night (which is not uncommon) and that visibly upset you. Also, you had 3 adults in the room when you had booked for 2. This was visible to all and you kept insisting that the 3rd person was just visiting. I hate to say this but you were rude, dominating and impossible to deal with , the entire length of your stay. You even hung up on me when I called you on your cell phone after your stay. God Bless, Nick

Summary: Been staying here for a while, staff is very friendly and accommodating, rooms are as expected, and is nicely located close to Brea Downtown.

Summary Heading: One of the worst hotels I have ever stayed in
Summary: The first room had a horrible odor in it and we requested a new room.  The second room had filthy walls and stained carpeting.  The refrigerator froze all the food we placed inside of it.  The room cost $117 a night.  A horrible place to stay and I was thrilled to leave the next morning.
Manager Response: Hello Guest, We did move you from one room to the other on your request. As you could see the first room you were in was immediately rented out to another guest and they were fine with it. I know there is 1 tiny dark spot on the carpet behind the door that cannot be removed, other than that the room is sparkling clean and there are no stains on the walls either. All our refrigerators are set on normal cooling, unless someone would have changed the setting. Even then, it is hard to imagine food freezing in the fridge compartment. You had reserved well in advance and we think ,it was the price (including taxes-for 2 queen beds) that put you off more than anything else. I hoped you would have mentioned your concerns to us, we would definitely have set things right for you. Nick

Summary: I have stayed at some Travelodge motels that were real nice.  This was the worst I have seen.  The place was clean, but very old,every thing showed no updates or even paint for many years. The room was very small and dark, the advertised breakfast was a danish, coffee and frosted flakes.  The coffee dispenser was empty much of the time and it took a long time to brew another pot. The manager was friendly but he had a task trying to make this place run.
Manager Response: We thank you for your review Mr. Arlo , and would like to mention that our property has recently updated with brand new granite furniture, bath walls and extremely well lit with LED lighting. Breakfast is always as per Brand Standards and a little more. Each of the 3 days you stayed here, the Coffee dispenser was filled up to the brim. And, we had to refill it each of these days as you and your partner had large canisters that you would keep refilling. At each point during your stay you were asked and your reply was that you found your room very comfortable. Upon Checkout you were again asked and you replied in the affirmative and also thanked us for letting you check in really early in the morning (when regular check-in is at 3.00pm). Had you told us even once that you were not happy we would have tried to rectify the problem to your satisfaction. But it really hurts when after all the effort that we put in, and after we strive to excel in customer satisfaction we find you unhappy. Not when you were here, but after you go back home. For Travelodge Brea, Nick

Summary: Adequate accommodation for a reasonable price. The proprietors go out of their way to make sure your stay is enjoyable. Clean and comfortable room with mini-fridge, microwave oven and coffee maker with supplies. There were no clothes hangers in the room. We asked for some and they were immediately delivered. The breakfast is bleak - very unattractive apples, individually wrapped pastries, slices of bread for toasting, instant oatmeal packets, tiny cans of juice, lukewarm coffee. I would have rated this property a 5 except for the dismal breakfast.

When we walked into the room and turned on the light, there was a spider on one of the beds. The spider JUMPED off the bed and as I was about to step on it, it moved (kinda leaped) very fast across the floor. I cornered it and was able to kill it with my flip-flop. The bedspreads were dirty. Later, we found a cricket in the toilet, though it was dead. The breakfast was "continental", but VERY limited. We would not stay here again for the price we paid for the room, $127.20/night; two nights. That is why we always carry "raid and "lysol" with us on road trips. You have these problems in all types (price wise) of hotels, you never can tell.
Manager Response: Hello, You checked in for one night and then you extended your stay for another night the next morning. When you were asked about the room you mentioned all was fine and you declined service on the second day of your stay. Upon Check-out when we asked you, as we ask each and every guest - you said you found your stay comfortable. Also, I think because you were charged additional for the extra Adult in your room, you found the rate high. We take personal care and attention and our rooms are regularly fumigated for pest control. It is sad that you never once mentioned these things during your stay. You even extended your stay without a word about any kind of insect. Our bedspreads are washed after each guests stay, breakfast is as per Brand Standards which you enjoyed on both days of your stay.  For Travelodge Brea, Nick

Summary: Fun and part of the Staycation tour. Bed is comfortable and parking is secure within the travelodge. No issues with wifi, staff or location. Reasonable, clean and offered a serene adventure close to home.
The hotel is fine, good location. When we arrived the toilet was filthy from a previous guest, but was cleaned after I went to the front desk.

rooms are average no iron in the room. beds are very comfortable, had a great nigh sleep. lobby coffee was good. we expected more for the breakfast. offered 2 bananas 2 apples, 4 pieces of bread, 2 boxes of cereal. walked in together with other family to get breakfast and their was not enough for all of us so we went somewhere else to eat. for the price we pay Travelodge should be a little more generous.
Manager Response: Hello, We thank you for your review and are glad you found our beds comfortable and coffee was to your liking. Breakfast is as per Brand Standards and a little more, and nothing is measured. There is always plenty for each guest and is replenished as needed. I am sure that we would have been able to satisfy you as well as the other guests present at that time. July is by far our busiest month and we would have truly appreciated your patience. I hope you stay with  us again and I assure you, we will exceed your expectations. For Travelodge Brea, Nick

Summary: Manager very friendly and helpful.  The property is quiet and good location in North Orange County.  Will stay next year.

Bed was very uncomfortable, very hard, location of room was very noisy from outside disturbances. Disturbed our sleep or kept us from sleeping. The air conditioning was also very loud. We have stayed here before and didn't have these problems. Also I was charged a fee for booking he room through the internet and is was not disclosed at the time of booking.
Manager Response: Hello, We know you have stayed here in the past, and you liked our property and rooms. That makes you come back. Our King bedrooms have a firm mattress, and had you mentioned being uncomfortable with  this - we would definitely have moved you to a different room. I assure you that there was no outside noise that would have disturbed you and the Air-conditioners in the rooms are not loud either. Also, there definitely was no additional fee charged by Wyndham or the Hotel for your booking. Your Reservation had a simple room charge and city taxes, that was that. I am emailing you a copy of your room folio too.We reassure you of the comfort and quiet the next time you stay with us. For Travelodge Brea, Nick

Summary: We book for this place at the last minute, and we get our room fast enough to catch some sleep after a day at disneyland. Our room was clean, nice and the bed really cozy. Thanks for the great service!

There is nothing wrong with the hotel but nothing spectacular.  Was not as good as some other Travel Lodge's,  Not as modern but clean,safe, and I had no problems.  Staff was very nice to me Breakfast area was kind of small, but only 1 other guest there at that time..
We were pleased with the accommodations, the room was clean and neat.  The beds were comfortable and the air conditioner worked.  It was nice and quiet.  There was not much close parking.

An average motel/hotel stay in a very nice, quiet neighborhood.  This Travelodge location is in Brea.  It is within walking distance of beverage stores, three restaurants, a doughnut place and a coffee shop.  There is a Stater Bros. grocery store and shopping center at the next main intersection (I found it to be a comfortable walk.).    The free breakfast is a joke:  No posted hours.  Only available from 7-9 a.m.  This is what was offered:  4 small cans of juice sitting in ice water, several slices of cheap brown bread in a plastic container, 4 boxes of sugared cereal, 4 packages of very cheap honey bun type pastries, coffee and milk.  I stared at the display in disbelief and then, walked out the door.    Room:  Stained carpet.  Memory foam topped bed - not bad.  Cable TV.
Manager Response: Hello Sir, We  thank you for your review and would like to remind you that you actually saws the Hours Posted right behind the Front Desk Counter, which mentions the Property Check-in Time, Check-out time and Breakfast Hours (between 6 am and 9 am). I know you were visibly upset the first day that you stayed here, because you came for breakfast well after 9:30 am. Breakfast is as per Brand Standards and by no means 'Cheap'. You even mentioned having seen the sign "Check-In 3:00pm", when you had arrived a little after 1:00pm. We graciously let you check-in at that time since we had rooms ready. After that, the 2 days that you stayed each time you were greeted with a smile and a Hello but you never acknowledged us. There are no stains in our carpets which are shampooed at regular intervals. We would have really appreciated if you had stated any concerns during your stay or at Check-Out, when we ask all our guests if they found their stay satisfactory.

Summary: We were able to change rooms from a king to a 2 queen room without any problems. The desk help was great and we would definitely stay there again.

Summary Heading: Does not adhere to Wyndham Reward perks
Summary: This is a motel not hotel. If you are a Wyndham rewards member they will not honor the perks. The gentlemen that helped me would not let me check in early nor late as the perks indicate that I am entitled to. The room is small and not very clean. The walls and windows need a wipe down desperately! No kleenex... Only one hand and wash towel... Don't walk barefoot on the floor... The continental breakfast = 1 tiny can of apple and orange juice and bread on my first trip at 6am and on my 2nd trip to see what was offered was 1 more apple and orange juice, 1 bruised banana and 2 apples and bread for toast. What a joke! The internet was weak and the bed was like jello (reminded me of an I 💗 Lucy episode). Now that I've checked out they have charged my card twice for the room.
Manager Response: Hello, You are local, so you have stayed at our property on more than one occasion, and because you are a smoker, the same room over and over. This last time, you checked-in just after 2.00pm which is before the normal check-in time of 3.00pm.You asked for a 1.00pm check out and we mentioned that on a Sunday, once housekeeping leaves the room is left unattended, and you agreed to a 11.30am check-out, which you did. Each time you have stayed at our property Kleenex and the extra roll of toilet paper has gone missing (which we would not like to mention, but you say there was none, which we can prove otherwise).There are always 2 Hand towels and wash cloths, one each in the bathroom and vanity area. Breakfast is as per Brand Standards and there are always plenty of fruit and fruit juices and other goodies available for guests, which are replenished on a regular basis. We even told you we can email you your folio showing just  the 1 charge for your room and taxes, which you declined to accept.    Nick

Summary Heading: The smallest towel I've ever seen!
Summary: The room was clean, except for the food left in the fridge from previous guest and mirror in bathroom not clean.   The bath towel was just a little bigger than a hand towel! Seriously?? It barely covered me and I wear a size 8, so I'm average.   Breakfast?? I don't think so!!!
Manager Response: Hello Madam, I apologize for the food left behind in the fridge. That was form housekeeping and you did mention this after Check-in and it  was promptly removed. Apologies were tendered at that very moment. Towels are regular Brand Standard size and we know you have stayed at our property previously and enjoyed your stays here. Again, breakfast is as per Brand Standards  and we are always open to guest suggestions. Thank You, Nick

Summary: It's a small place with easy access.  My husband has difficulty walking and it was so nice to park in front of your door.  I would definitely stay again if in that area again

I come to Fullerton at least once per month and very often more to enable a visit with my family  I am greeted by name when I call  and a small conversation follows. The owners know which room I prefer and make my reservation from records on file.  It is such a pleasure to find the owners/managers relating to customers in our current world.  It is well kept motel and represents good value.

Summary Heading: Safe and clean lodging at a great price in north Orange County
Summary: The proprietors care about your stay and will make sure you are happy. The rooms are small but clean and functional. The bathroom was spotlessly clean. The breakfast is limited (think continental) but commensurate with the price of the room. The only problem we encountered was too few bath towels in the room, but this was quickly remedied by the staff. Overall a great price for safe and clean lodging in north Orange County.
Accommodating and cozy for an unexpected stay. The only compliant I have is the Internet did not work.
This facility is clean and in a good location by downtown Brea, the management is very nice and accommodating.

So this happened:  I reserved a King bed room from Fri - Sun. Upon arrival I was told that no King size bed rooms were available, but instead they will "upgrade me" to a bigger room, with 2 queens.  I get the bigger room, with 2 queens Friday night. On Saturday, they come and tell me I have to move because this room is reserved. They will move me to a King size bed room.  I move to my new room, it's the same exact size as my room from Friday night. I did a quick scan, all the rooms were the same size.  Short version: I didn't get the room I reserved, I was lied to about an "upgrade". And then I get kicked out of the room I got upgraded to.  Ask me if I would go back again.
Manager Response: Hello, You did get the room you reserved, you had made an advance purchase reservation which you wanted to cancel. Now this reservation is non-cancellable as stated to you by corporate. You arrived late on a rainy night and we accommodated you in a room with 2 queen size beds, and it was you who said that you would rather have the King bed the next morning. We waited for you and then moved you to the King bedroom. So, you were given the exact room you had reserved for. For Travelodge Brea Nick

Summary: The water in the shower was not hot - room temperature would be a good guess. We checked in late at night, with an early departure, so sleep was more important than resolving the water problem. Interestingly, the water in the sink was hot. Room 103
Manager Response: Hello, We do not have any Hot water issue in that room (#103), and we so wish you had asked Front Desk for assistance if there was any issue. We would have rectified the issue at that very moment. Thank You, Nick

Summary: The manager who helped me check in on the first day was very helpful as she let us check-in a little early as our flight arrived early in the morning and we had been exhausted from it. In addition, when my key didn't work (the other one did for some odd reason), she came with me to see what was wrong, changed both cards, and personally saw that the new ones worked. The only trouble we had was on the last morning while packing our things to check-out and leave. The manager that day had been rude and sarcastic on the phone an hour and a half before check-out. The last thing I needed was to be rushed when making sure I have all of my belongings, and so brashly.
Manager Response: Hello, We would like to apologize to you if the front desk agent on the day of your checkout, sounded rude or sarcastic. Upon querying him we found out that even if he did sound that way he had no intention to be rude or sarcastic. And, he further stated he would never dream of offending a guest ever. We always treat all our guests with the utmost respect and courtesy. Thank You, Nick

Summary: Stayed two weeks for business.  This is not a super fancy place but the room was very clean, beds were comfortable and the staff was quite pleasant.  I had a heavy truck tractor with me. They allowed the spot to be reserved.

This is one of the best Hotels I've been too. The owner and the people who work there are a pleasure to deal with. They are professional and have very good with customer service. They are always willing to accommodate guest in any way they can!!

We request a roll away bed and was told it could happen, when we got there it was rainy and we were told it's not gonna happen because they don't carry them and our brother would have to pay an additional $45 for our stay.
Manager Response: Hello, We do carry rollaway beds and when you Checked-In at 3.15 am the rollaway beds were already taken. Your reservation was for 3 nights with 2 people. There is an additional charge for each extra adult (children below 17 stay free). We did provide you with blankets and additional towels and linen. Also, you stayed here during the NAAM convention and we were extremely busy, but we took care of all your needs. We even asked you on Check-out if you found everything alright and you replied positively.

Summary: Convenient for me to visit family members in the area. Definitely will consider staying here next time I travel to the area.

When I arrived I was turned around and tired, my recent foot surgery, I was just beat. I still had NAMM SHOW to do. Nick, the Manager was so very personable and helpful. Wjth accurate and true directions. The property is quite, clezn and has njce landscaping. Brea has a good vibe, a safe place.

There was a live bug crawling in my bed when I turned back the covers.  They had to change my room late and didn't offer to help me move. I still couldn't sleep well in the other room.  Breakfast was just OK but could have had hard boiled eggs for a little protein.
Manager Response: Hello Ms.Williams, You checked in around 8.30 pm and at around 11.00 pm you said you felt like there was a bug, we immediately moved you to another room (the front desk at the time was helping check-in another guest, so you had to move your bag to the next door room by yourself) . Upon inspection, we found no bug and there indeed are no bugs in our rooms. When we met you in the morning you said you had a good nights sleep. We do not serve hard boiled eggs for breakfast as was mentioned to you while you were enjoying your breakfast.

Summary: Seriously, these ppl act like it's going to kill them to put out a breakfast. You have to come and they bring it out. The milk wasn't good like basically expired. I'll never return to this one...
Manager Response: Hello Ms.Hardy, Breakfast is laid out every day 6.00 AM to 9.00 AM and is as per Brand standards. Even if you came by a little later we gladly serve you. Ms. Hardy, you put your parents up at our property for 5 nights and we took care of their needs, besides this they helped themselves to our fruit trees abundantly. They always had multiple servings each day and even after the stipulated hours .You did not even stay at the property, it was your parents who stayed and they were really happy with their stay here and said they would definitely return and recommend us to other guests. It has been over a month since their stay with us and now we get this review, which saddens us.  Nick

Summary Heading: The room was a little shabby and run down as was the...
Summary: The room was a little shabby and run down as was the property in general. The bed was absolutely miserable. It was worn out with troughs in both sides. Much like sleeping in a hammock. Breakfast was underwhelming, and the room was noisy all night. I won't stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello, You booked thru Orbitz.com for 2 nights. You then extended your stay for a third night. At each point during your stay you were asked about the room and you mentioned all was fine. We even helped you find a nice Italian Restaurant when you asked for advise. I invite you to come by once again and show us what is shabby about the room or the property. I remember greeting you with a smile , and saying good morning ,each morning even though you never responded. My question is, if you don't mind my asking, why did you extend your stay for a third night, let alone stay the first two nights. Nick

Summary: It is hard to find a more affordable hotel in the area. The room was clean.  Parking was tight.  Desk help was very nice.  The room could have used some fresh air or air freshener.  The room came with only one bar of soap and it was broken.  I would recommend Kimmies (about a block away) for breakfast.

Most Travelodge locations are average at best .  This one is a cut above that. My room was very comfortable and clean.  Every thing worked fine and the staff was very polite and friendly.  Thanks for a good nights rest..

Not super clean, not dirty, good middle of the road.  There was a bit of a strange smell in the room.  Bed was super soft, which was rough on my back.  The internet was soooooooooo incredibly slow and poor signal.
Manager Response: Hello, We thank you for your review and would like to add that while most guests really like our beds, it depends totally on personal comfort. I met you a number of times during your stay and even once if you would have mentioned this I would definitely have moved you to a different room. Also, AT&T had set up a new router which was causing Internet connectivity problems but it is sorted out now and I assure you of super fast speed he next time you stay with us. My apologies and thank you for staying with us. Nick

Summary: Really if you need a cheap place to sleep while you are in LA, this is the spot. I stayed for 5 nights with my fiancé. It is not too far from Irvine or Orange County, but a little farther away from LAX and downtown LA. The bed wasn't very comfortable and the wifi was pretty spotty. Also, their complimentary breakfast wasn't that good. Since this place is cheap, it does attract undesirable guests. I had a neighbor that left their dog in the next room (even though no pets are allowed) that barked through the walls all day and night... and then another neighbor that yelled at us for "stealing" their parking spots. Parking does get busy. Otherwise, the service was good, as the owner was quite receptive to requests and complaints. I think that made up for the bad experiences I had
Manager Response: Hello, Within a few minutes of your check-in, we changed you to a bigger room, also, we explained to you that it was a service animal in the neighboring room. Our rooms have pillow top mattresses which most guests find very comfortable. We accorded you with extra towels an linen whenever you asked for them, even late in the afternoon. I apologize if you were inconvenienced in any way and if a guest did misbehave, we apologize on their behalf too. Thank You, For Travelodge Brea, Nick

Summary: Arrived @ 10:30pm, horrible traffic, fwy closures. Key wouldn't work, battery dead on doorknob. Room was tiny, bed was horribly uncomfortable, no extra TP, no extra towels, black hair in tub....never again!
Manager Response: Hello, It seems you arrived here facing a lot of traffic and other issues which got you upset even before you checked-in. We apologized to you for the electronic lock situation and the Front Desk Agent opened your room door immediately. We always ask our guests during their stay and on Check-Out if they found everything satisfactory and never once were we informed of the bathtub issue. Also, if you needed any extra supplies you could have dialed 'O' from your room and we would have gladly served your needs. Thank you and God Bless. For Travelodge Brea, Nick

Summary: This is a nice place to stay. It is nice and quite and off the beaten path but within walking distance there are many things to do. It was easy to find and the owners are very friendly. The bed was comfortable and the room was just the right size for me. Breakfast they had coffee and rolls and dry breakfast cereal.  I would go back to this hotel.

For an old facility it was ok. But simple improvements would help. Only one chair for sitting and we were a couple. Bathroom very cramped for people of size. Found a pair of men's briefs stuck behind the bathroom door. No mat for the tub and the tub was very small. Maid forgot to have new soap when she stocked the room after cleaning.   Bedside lights could be lower on the wall.   + comments. Very quiet for a busy street. Good TV.
Manager Response: Hello, You stayed with us for 4 nights, not once did you mention you were inconvenienced in any way. No bad comments upon Check-Out either. I apologize for any inconvenience faced and while we work very hard to please all our guest's, we also ask each of our guest's during their stay if they found everything all right. No leftover item from a previous guest was ever turned in. We would definitely have provided you with an additional chair, had you asked. We have fairly new bathtubs which do not require rubber mats but cotton bath mats are provided in each room. The bathtub is standard size as all bathtubs, and so is the bathroom. I also apologize for the bed lights being higher than what you would have expected or liked. Thank You, For Travelodge Brea, Nick

Summary Heading: Nicely situated and clean place at reasonable cost.
Summary: Hotel has good location close to the theater,  Brea Mall, dining. Building/rooms not new but veryclean. About 10 miles away from Disneyland.

Summary Heading: NICE COMFY PLACE FOR THE PRICE
Summary: We came in on July 30, 2016 after a long day driving through LA traffic.  We found the check-in very easy and a very happy, personable and welcoming staff.  The room was pretty average budget type, well lit and very clean and nicely furnished w/mini fridge, microwave and coffee maker.  Since we had other plans for breakfast, I can't comment on the continental breakfast.  We had plans to stay here for 2 nights.  We did not ask, need or expect the staff (housekeeping) to come in and tidy up or change the bedding and towels after the first night, but they did anyway.  Super!! This motel is not a Holiday Inn by any means, but we were very satisfied with everything and highly recommend it for those travelers concerned about budgets.  There are several quick food establishments within
It's located in a nice area and close enough to Aneheim and L.A. The only complain I have is the bed sheets are too rough, would be better with softer sheets.
Manager Response: Hello, We thank you for your review and while we understand you found everything else to your liking, we would like to add that the sheets we use are leased from a reputed Linen Company and we can assure you that they are of good quality. For Travelodge Brea, Nick

Summary: I arrived early and they gave me a room without a problem.  The room was clean and the a/c worked well.  I did not stay long enough for breakfast or to review housekeeping.  The door in the room needed a new seal.  You could see light on the edges. I could hear traffic (I was at the front of the hotel) It did not bother me but it might bother someone else.  A great overnight stay.  I would recommend to anyone.  It is not a 5 star hotel but you are not paying for one either.  i would stay here again.
A very friendly place to stay. Check in was fast and easy, I like that you can park in front of your room.

So after checking into this hotel and being forced to go to my bank to deposit more money for the deposit even though I have the cash, I was extremely happy to get into the very comfortable bed that they had. Unfortunately I got a phone call the next morning regarding my medical dog saying that it was a non pet friendly hotel. By law they are not allowed to ask for these items or give me a hard time about my medical died because of the Disability Act in 1995. When I was getting ready to check out I found a roach carcass underneath the microwave band called the front desk to tell them about it. They apologized and said that it was probably because of my dog! Dogs don't usually carry Roaches on them you guys! This was so ignorant and very offensive because I knew that that roach
Manager Response: Hello, You stayed 2 nights. You had a Do Not Distaurb sign on your door the first day. You had guests both days. Even one of your guest's had a dog with him which you said was a service animal. When we asked you to let us in to view the roach (if any) you refused to let us in, we did not find any roach after you checked out and the room was not in a condition to be rented out for the next couple of days. For Travelodge Brea, Nick

Summary: This hotel had clean rooms and facilities.  Very near downtown Brea for shopping.  My stay was for business, so I only needed a place to sleep at night.  When housekeeping would come in during the day, the AC got turned off and I always returned to a hot room.  Breakfast was somewhat sparse - cereal and toast - but that was fine with me.
Manager Response: Hello Mr Dye, We appreciate your taking the time to write a review of our Hotel. We are glad we lived up to your expectations and I also remember having changed your refrigerator (carried one up to your room) at 8:00pm. Breakfast is as per Brand Standards with Danish's, Fruit, Fruit Juices, Instant Oatmeal with Tea Coffee etc. In order to conserve energy we try to keep Air-conditioning off during the day time, but had you mentioned during your stay, we would have instructed Housekeeping to leave the AC running throughout the day. Thank You, For Travelodge Brea Nick

Summary: The rooms very so nice the TV was set up nice so both beds are able to get a good view good cable channels,   however i wish they would offer breakfast
Manager Response: Hello, We thank you for your Review and would like to add that we do serve breakfast every morning between 6:00 AM - 9:00 AM. It is mentioned at the Front Desk and we make it a point to inform our guests too, at Check-In. Thank You, For Travelodge Brea, Nick

Summary: Mattresses were very hard.  Hairs that didn't belong to us on the pillows.  Garbage cans in room were full when we checked in.
Manager Response: Hello, Our Mattresses are as per Brand Standard and we do apologize if you found it hard, also, regarding the pillowcase and the garbage cans, I think you must have checked-in prior to housekeeping having done with their cleaning. And, I am sure if you would have brought this matter to the attention of the front desk on duty, I am positive that this would have been taken care of. Also, it is surprising that we were not informed even once during your stay, and also when we ask on Check-Out, as we do all guests if they found their stay satisfactory. Thank You, For Traveldodge Brea, Nick

Summary Heading: Clean,  budget friendly,  accommodates elderly, nice staff, parking good
Summary: This little place served our needs to a "t".  It was clean, parking right in front, very accommodating for elderly and nice staff.  Nothing fancy, but all we needed for a pleasant stay.

Very limited parking and the spaces are narrow if you have a full sized vehicle such as a pick up truck. I arrived after 1AM and there was only one marked parking place available.  I parked properly between the lines, but the space between vehicles was narrow. When I came out in the morning to leave at around 10AM the car next to where I parked was gone and someone had scratched (keyed) the entire left side of the bed of my truck leaving about 10 deep scratch marks. I reported it to the manager on duty, but he said there was nothing the hotel could do and I would need to make a police report and if the police were willing to come out to investigate the would consent to showing them the security video of the parking area. He apologized and said that's the way it goes.  As far as
Manager Response: Hello, We thank you for your review and I clearly remember having Checked you in at 1 pm. Though Check-in time is not before 3 pm. I was right there at the Front Desk and I asked you if you had called about not arriving the first night of your stay (which apparently was No-Show). I took barely 2 minutes to Check you in after that as can be witnessed on the Audio Visual Recordings at the Front Office. I do apologize for scratch marks on your vehicle, which has never happened in the past at our property. Also, towels are as per Brand Standard and Breakfast is between 6 AM and 9 AM every morning. We instruct each guest, upon Check-In on the Wi-fi usage as I explained to you. I even asked you to call from your room if you had trouble connecting. God Bless For Travelodge Brea Nick

Summary: Overall I would definitely recommend this hotel. Very clean room and convenient location for me. Very friendly staff upon check in and check out. The Wi Fi connection could be worked on. I only had service the first day. Overall a very good place to stay, I would come again!!
Manager Response: Hello Suzanne, We thank you for your review and while we know you were pleased with your stay overall, the one thing that bothered you, 'the WiFi', has been updated. We have brand new Access points which provide excellent range and speed all over the property. For Travelodge Brea, Nick

Summary: This location is clean, in a safe area, the employees could be nicer, but it doesn't bother me too much. I like that I can check in really late after I visit Disneyland. It's close enough to the park without being too close and super pricey. It's my go to place. The price is great. I prefer staying here than any other hotel. I definitely recommend this place.

This is basic accommodation, nothing fancy, as the price reflects. The rooms are clean and secure. The staff is very eager to make their customers happy. The breakfast is pretty sparse but in line with other inexpensive motels' continental breakfasts. The staff puts out only a small number of each breakfast item at any given time, possibly to minimize theft, but will bring out additional items when asked. Internet was slow, possibly due to high demand.

Summary Heading: We have stayed here several times while visiting family...
Summary: We have stayed here several times while visiting family. The staff is always friendly and helpful. The facility us always clean and kept up nicely. While not lavish, the breakfast is totally adequate. It is not a luxery hotel and we don't expect it to be. The only complaint is that the pool has only been open on one of our visits and we would like to use it more. We plan to continue to stay here whenever we visit Ashland.
This was a plain, basic room. Wi-fi worked. No maid service for second night. Loud plumbing noise from next door. Room was clean. Morning coffee warm, not hot.
Manager Response: Hello, Thank you for your review, this gives us an opportunity to portray our side. I remember having Checked you in, also remember having lowered your rate from what you had reserved for. On the second day housekeeping came twice to your door and was refused entry, after that there was a 'Do Not Disturb' sign hanging outside your door all day. During your stay and upon Check-Out we asked you, as we ask all guests, if we lived up to your expectations and you replied positively. We, as Hospitality Managers accord each guest with the same respect and courtesy, no matter what. And we shall keep serving in the way we know best, with a big smile and an open heart. For Travelodge Brea Nick GM

Summary: Internet verrrrry slow. Internet was so slow I'd have to stopping in between and wait extra minutes to load. It is overly slow.
Manager Response: Hello, We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you, but had you informed us, we would definitely have taken care of the issue. Also, we have Hard wired Internet available in all guests rooms as is mentioned to all guests on Check-In. I am sure you will have no cause for complaint the next time you visit our Hotel. Thank you

Summary: All is good with this hotel except for one thing... The beds.  Of you have a bad back you will want to stay somewhere else.  The matresses are the absolute cheapest things that they could buy!  No support whatsoever!  If it weren't for such bad matresses I would give this hotel 5 stars for the price.  Its old but maintained.
Manager Response: Hello, We would like to mention that our Mattresses are Brand standard and Brand approved and they are certainly not cheap. Also, I cannot place your stay here, but since you are local I invite you to come by and check out our facility again. I would like to add that we always ask our guests during their stay and upon Check-Out if their stay was comfortable and we always get a positive reply. Thank You

Summary Heading: Stay here and spend more money having fun
Summary: If what you want is a clean, reasonably price place to stay while shopping, sightseeing or seeing museums, this old style motel is  still fine, as past reviews have said.  I will add that I was worried about the noise there is no real buffer from Brea, which can be very busy.  But there was no problem.

Summary Heading: Have  Stayed there a few times and have found it clean comfortable
Summary: Though it is an older Hotel the rooms are clean and comfortable and the management very pleasant and helpful and the price reasonable,  the Continental Breakfast is a little lacking.  It is not far from Disneyland and is a heck of a lot quieter and more affordable than the ones close to Disneyland

Summary Heading: Great place, great location, cool staff
Summary: The room is pretty basic but it met or exceeded my expectations for cleanliness. I'll sure be back if I am in the area.

Expected a worn out room based on location and dated appearance.  Very clean and updated.  Only criticism I can offer is the walls are a little thin, lovers next door.  Room was a touch small but had one very comfortable bed.  I would return.

Summary Heading: Clean Reasonably Priced Place to Stay in North Orange County
Summary: This trip to O.C. I decided to try a new place in Brea.  I had seen this property before but the pictures suggested it might have some wear and tear.  The continental breakfast was adequate with juice, coffee, cereals, toast and milk.  I was very pleased with the room which was spacious and very clean and recently refurnished (say within 5 years).  The area is fairly quiet so a good nights sleep is no problem.  A great deal for the price.

Summary Heading: Very comfortable room for one night stay visiting family at...
Summary: Very comfortable room for one night stay visiting family at Christmas time.  Nice and clean.  This was our second time staying on Christmas Eve and will more than likely be back again next year.

Summary Heading: Room was clean.  Bathroom was clean.   Shower water never...
Summary: Room was clean.  Bathroom was clean.   Shower water never got more than lukewarm. ADA shower ran water all over bathroom floor. Not enough towels. No washcloths.  Heater was very loud and interrupted sleep.  Breakfast was poor quality. We were not late for the hours of serving. There should have been more available.  We will not stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello, We thank you for your review and would like to mention that towels, hand towels and wash cloths are always in-room as per brand requirements and you can always request for more, if needed. Breakfast is also per brand standards and I remember being there asking you if more was needed. I also remember having helped you operate the toaster. Water temperature is always moderated as per guest comfort. Also, I would like to mention your Reservation was for a different room type and because the ADA room was available, we changed your room type as per your request. The ADA shower is cordoned by a shower curtain, and when that is closed no water seeps thru as the drain is tapered inwards. Thank You and God Bless

Summary Heading: Nice place, quiet area, but walls are paper thin
Summary: I didn't have the bad experiences with management cited by other guests.   I thought everything in the room itself was great. The shower was the best I've ever seen at a motel in this price range.   It is also in a nice, quiet area without random cholos running around, which is more than I can say of other motels in the Fullerton-Brea area.   The biggest downside, and the reason why I deduct 1 or even 2 stars, is because of the walls.   The walls are truly paper thin. We could hear not only the TV, but the conversations, of other guests all night. We had to turn our own TV on in the middle of the night and leave it playing all night just to drown out the sound coming from other rooms. Truly pathetic.   So, it's a nice place, but DO NOT stay here if you cannot sleep with noise.
Manager Response: Hello, We thank you for taking time to review our property and I do apologize for inconvenience caused due to noisy neighbors. Had we been informed, we would definitely have attended to that. We have sound channels running thru our room walls and we welcome you to be our guest again. You seem to be from the Fullerton area which is right next door to our property. Thank You and God Bless. Nick

Summary Heading: Basic Hotel with nice amenities but customer service blows
Summary: Room was very clean. Basic amenities with flat screen, refrigerator, and microwave. Industry standard decor. Owner/Front desk is not the friendliest or welcoming. He is not mean nor rude but gives impression of you are bothering him with your questions or requests. He is always lurking and watching which is a bit uneasy.   WiFi is not secure, so use at your own risk, open network. Property is clean and well kept. Parking is small and tight, so large cars beware. Right up the street from downtown Brea, which is full of Restaurants, comedy store, local mall, and various groceries store like Ralphs and Walmart. Freeway is a few blocks away which can take you to Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm; also right to the beach or Fashion Island.  The mattress was old, lumpy, drooping, and
Manager Response: Hello, We thank you for taking time to write a review on our property. Please understand that this property is not owned by an individual,l as stated by you but by a corporation. We, as employees take great pride in working here and treat each guest as we would our own friend or relative. I remember well, 'your stay' , as it was on the day of thanksgiving and the next. We would never question a guest as to 'why' ? and we always carry a smile on our face no matter how tough our day has been. Our beds are as per brand standards and comfortable, so is the air-conditioning, we would never in our dream behave as if a guest is annoying, in fact we go out of our way to make a guest feel comfortable, so sometimes we may repeatedly ask you if you find everything al-right, and breakfast is between 6 am - 9 am every morning. Thank you and God Bless

Summary Heading: Friendly and fast check in and out
Summary: This property is in a great location for Southern California attractions. The management is very friendly and check in was fast. I will stay here again. Clean rooms and you can park in front of your room.
The staff was friendly and courteous. I was also pleasantly surprised at how clean the place was. Great prices too.

The room and property was clean. The bed a little hard and the pillows a little flimsy, but this is also an economically viable choice, so I didn't expect 5 star quality. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. I like liked that there was quick internet access, cable with a lot of channels, a fridge and microwave, and THREE different religious texts in the bedside drawer (not just a bible, but The Teachings of Buddha and the Bhagavad Gita as well). I'm not a particularly religious person, but I was impressed with the respect for diversity this displayed. This is not a fancy, resort style motel, but it's a very high quality place for anyone's practical need to have a place to lay one's head at night. I stayed 3 nights because it's close to where I work and had to vacate my
The only negative I can say is it is a bit tight pulling into your spot beside the building in the middle of the parking lot. The room and amenities suited what I required on my stay.

this is the second time I've stayed at this hotel. It's staff is friendly, even at 11pm when we arrive late. The rooms are nice, not fancy but nice. The only request I'd make is for a little more of a continental breakfast.

I chose this location for its proximity to a multi-day event I was attending, but also because it was the least expensive and had the best ratings.  I was pleased that the price and quality were just right.  This location appears to be owned by a family and they do an excellent job of keeping everything immaculately clean and well run.

Highly recommend  it here!!  Great price, nice, new and clean.  Super quiet and safe.  I stayed here for 5 nights, by myself and never once felt scared.  It is so clean and quiet.  I will def stay here every time I visit my family in California. Best!!!!

I got there late and was treated ok but when I walked into the room there was a very strong smell of urine.  The room appeared to be clean but in the morning you could see the big spots on the carpet and the smell was irritating.  To check out there was no one at the window and some guy came out of another house in front and was very rude as if I was interrupting him.  I would not recommend at all.
Manager Response: Hello, We apologize if the Front Desk person looked irritated, also , every guest is asked after Check-In and upon Check-Out if they found the room in good condition, and you did not say otherwise. Your room was checked prior to your Check-In and upon your Check-Out, there was no evidence of smell nor were there spots on your room carpet. I think this was written because there was a pre-authorization on your card upon Check-In and which you wanted reversed back before Check-Out time. God Bless

Summary: Slow check in, there was not one at the front desk. I had to wait for someone to come from one of the rooms to check me in. The room had a dirty carpet, dirty bathroom. Motel 6 has a better price and better looking rooms.
Manager Response: Hello, We cannot really place your stay at our property. Also, the front desk personnel may have been helping another guest, so he may have been at one of the rooms at the time of your arrival. We pride in keeping our rooms immaculately clean. And we always ask guests after Check-In and upon Check-Out, if they find everything alright in their rooms. There never has been any concern from guests. And, I see Buena Park mentioned so you must be local, I invite you to come by and take a look around the property and our rooms at any time. Thank You and God Bless. For Travelodge Brea, Nick

Summary: Clean room and comfortable stay. The only bad thing was that the room was hot but after 20 min with the AC on high it was all good.

Summary Heading: It is a good, moderate place to stay with comfort. Staff is...
Summary: It is a good, moderate place to stay with comfort. Staff is very courteous and fast. The owner is available most of the time. Somehow breakfast is not upto the mark. It is so so.

This trip was our second at this hotel. We liked the little area that it is located in. It's a straight shot down Harbor to get to Disneyland, so that's a plus.  It's clean and relatively comfortable. No major issues with major stains or smells. The mattresses and bedding could use an update, but they were comfortable enough after three super long days in the parks. I do wish that there were a soap dish in the shower. The microwave and fridge exterior was a bit dingy, but we didn't need to use them, so it didn't bother us.  The front office is very nice if you are friendly and make an effort. I've seen previous complaints about the staff, but I had no problem at all.  The parking is minimal: one car per room. That isn't the hotel's fault though, and cannot be helped.  Overall,

The service was good and the location was very close to where I needed to be. I also liked the closeness and variety of places to shop in the immediate area. The room was nice, everything I needed was there.  The bed was amazing!!!  :)  I have a very bad back and got an excellent nights sleep, that was wonderful and unexpected!  My only complaint was the bath soap left my skin feeling dry and waxy.

Summary Heading: Warning!! Always ask for a receipt!
Summary: At the last minute we had to bring an extra child with us. When I checked in, they counted the people and the manager never told me there would be or will be an extra person charge. I asked for the receipt when I checked out. That's when I noticed that he had charged my credit card for an extra person without  letting me know. He could have notified me at check-in or check-out. I found out on my own on the receipt after.
Manager Response: Hello, We thank you for your review and would like to remind you that children always stay Free at Travelodge. There were 4 children in your party, and 3 adults. The additional charge was for the 3rd adult , which was mentioned to you clearly upon Check-In. Your initial Reservation was for only 2 Adults and 2 children, but as I said children always stay Free. God Bless

Summary: When we checked in Nick the manager was very nice. It was on one of the main streets. Room was clean and very nice. The bed was a little uncomfortable. When we left I told the manager on duty that possibly the mattress needed to be flipped over and she said she'd let housekeeping know. The continental breakfast was pretty sparse. We only stayed one night because there was no pool and we didn't realize it when we booked 3 nights. Nick was gracious enough to refund us the 2 nights we didn't stay.

The motel was clean, however, we had a party of 4 people and only received enough for 3.  When we asked for more they didn't have any.  We again asked the next day and while we were out of the room they gave us 3 sets of towels again.  The breakfast is very poor, the first day they ran out of sweet rolls so we had to split them. The next day we went early but still not enough food for everyone. We were lucky to get a can of orange juice.
Manager Response: Hello, We thank you for taking the time to write a review and apologize for any inconvenience. Towels and toiletries are always available in abundance and Breakfast items are replaced every so often. We are still trying to figure out where we erred and assure you that we strive to exceed guest  expectations.

Summary: My first trip stay at this location, a very fast and friendly check in with excellent service. Close to Disneyland and other attractions.

Summary Heading: A Place to Stay During Family Visit
Summary: I have family living in Fullerton, about a mile away from this hotel and they recommended it for a stay while I was in town. For reference, I was staying in Room 111 for 10 nights.   The property and room were clean and well maintained, and employees were very pleasant. Parking was adequate, and I was usually able to park just outside my room with no curb to drag luggage over. Appreciated, since I was traveling alone. There is a typical wall-mounted HVAC unit in the room, which did a good job of keeping the room cool. I like to have moving air at night and brought my own bedside fan, but didn't need it because the built-in unit was adequate. This also helped to provide white noise, so I was surprised to find on weekends that the parking lot and hotel were full or nearly so...

The reviews of this property that I read were good and it did live up to expectations. The owners were nice and checkin was quick. The room was freshly painted, had new sink and fixtures, and was very clean. The neighborhood is also very nice and safe. I have stayed at other hotels nearby and that wasn't the case.  The one down side was that the WiFi was extremely slow. I think they need more than one router on the property.  Having good WiFi is very important to me, because I do work on the computer when I am at a room.  I hope they work on this issue. I would definitely recommend and stay again.

this place was the only place for miles who would accommodate my stay. i needed to check in early in the morning from a long drive and they were able to make that happen, there was a small fee which i didnt mind paying. very clean, quiet, cozy, everything was new. absolutely loved this place and will be staying there again.
My room was clean, comfortable, and quiet, and the furnishings were nicer than I was expecting for the price. I didn't expect a granite-topped dresser and crown moulding! I would stay here again.
